content:
As a result of the Russian rocket strike in the city of Selidovo in Donetsk, 48 dwellings were destroyed in Donetsk region - 18 apartment and 30 private.

This was reported by the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine.

Tonight, around 1:30, Russia has been in the citymassive blow, previously-with S-300 SPR.

One private home is destroyed by the direct hit of a rocket.

At the time of the explosion, there were two people of good age inside. They were assisted by police and SES.

ForinformationSelidovskaya MBA, invaders released 6 C-300 missiles in the city of Selidovo. The shelling affected two civilians in 1989 and 1993, they were taken to a medical institution.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Kupyansk occupierspulled offAircraft on a multi -storey building.
